long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create your templates (or snippets) in Google Chrome and paste them in any website. 

You can: 
- create your templates from scratch or via copy-pasting content
- select any text from any website and create a template with the selected content
- open the sidebar and manage your templates
- import and export your templates
- insert the content of a template when targeting any input element while browsing
- tag your templates so searching is easier
